Articles.Content:
Hey Guys 

So I thought I would put this here, I have been following the project for a bit now but recently the developers of an upcoming space management game,  called Mars Horizon (in the spirit of Buzz Aldrin's Race to Space) have started a Kickstarter from their boardgame division for a similar space management card game called Mars Horizon: Blast

Here is the link to the Kickstarter, thought KSP players might be interested and given that this is a relatively small project, it's not easily discoverable:  Link

 

Edited February 12, 2019 by stargazer1235
Seems like an interesting project, I'll certainly look for this on shelves if it ever gets finished!
